content: On which popular sci-fi TV show did Captain Picard and his crew reside on the starship Enterprise?

Ah, you're referring to "Star Trek: The Next Generation," a highly popular science fiction television series that originally aired from 1987 to 1994. The show was created by Gene Roddenberry, who also conceived the original "Star Trek" series. In "The Next Generation," Captain Jean-Luc Picard, played by Sir Patrick Stewart, commands the starship USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D). The series is set in the 24th century and explores various themes including exploration, diplomacy, and the development of artificial intelligence, among others. It has gained a massive following and has been influential in the science fiction genre.
